item.title: Сүм ба Зах
item.description: Given enough eyeballs, all bugs are shallow. —Linus Torvalds Creative brains are a valuable, limited resource. They shouldn't be wasted on re-inventing the wheel when there are so many fascinating new problems waiting out there. —Eric S. Raymond When you lose interest in a program, your last duty to it is to hand it off to a competent successor. —Eric S.
